mapper.select: SELECT A.id AS m_id, A.receiver AS m_receiver, A.sender AS m_sender, A.show_type AS showType, A.list_type AS listType, A.top_time, E.`name` AS groupName, E.avatar AS groupAvatar, D.real_name AS realName, D.avatar AS m_receiverAvatar, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM iap_im_message_t WHERE sender = m_receiver AND receiver = #{user} AND state IN ( 0, 1 ) ) AS messageNumber, B.id, B.sender, B.receiver, B.title, B.content, B.action, B.state, B.format, B.TIMESTAMP, B.hide_message, B.senderRealName, B.sendAvatar, B.receiverRealName, B.receiverAvatar, F.id top_id, F.message_id, F.message_list_id, G.real_name AS top_realName, F.top_content, F.top_timestamp FROM ( SELECT id, list_type, receiver, sender, show_type, top_time FROM iap_im_message_user_t WHERE sender = #{user} AND show_type != 1 ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.id, A.sender, A.receiver, A.title, A.content, A.action, A.state, A.format, A.TIMESTAMP, A.hide_message, C.real_name AS senderRealName, C.avatar AS sendAvatar, D.real_name AS receiverRealName, D.avatar AS receiverAvatar FROM iap_im_message_t A LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t C ON A.sender = C.user_name LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t D ON A.receiver = D.user_name WHERE ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM iap_im_message_t WHERE ( sender = A.sender OR sender = A.receiver ) AND ( receiver = A.receiver OR receiver = A.sender ) AND `timestamp` > A.`timestamp` ) < 20 AND ( sender = #{user} OR receiver = #{user} ) AND ( hide_message NOT IN ( #{user} ) OR hide_message IS NULL ) AND action IN ( 0, 1, 3 ) ORDER BY A.sender, A.receiver, A.`timestamp` DESC ) B ON ( A.sender = B.sender AND A.receiver = B.receiver ) OR ( A.sender = B.receiver AND A.receiver = B.sender ) LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t D ON A.receiver = D.user_name LEFT JOIN iap_im_group_t E ON ( A.sender = E.id OR A.receiver = E.id ) LEFT JOIN iap_im_message_top_t F ON A.id = F.id LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t G ON G.user_name = F.top_person GROUP BY A.id, B.id

SELECT A.`timestamp`, (SELECT count( 1 ) FROM iap_im_message_t WHERE action = 3 AND `timestamp` = A.`timestamp` AND state IN ( 1, 2 )) messageNumber, B.real_name AS senderRealName, B.avatar AS sendAvatar, ( SELECT count( 1 ) FROM iap_im_group_member_t WHERE group_id = A.receiver ) AS groupNumber FROM ( SELECT id, sender, receiver, `timestamp` FROM iap_im_message_t WHERE action = 1 ) A LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t B ON B.user_name = A.sender GROUP BY A.id

SELECT A.id, A.action, A.content, A.extra, A.format, A.receiver, A.sender, A.state, A.`timestamp`, A.title, B.real_name AS senderRealName, B.avatar AS sendAvatar, C.real_name AS receiverRealName, C.avatar AS receiverAvatar FROM ( SELECT id, action, content, extra, format, receiver, sender, state, `timestamp`, title FROM iap_im_message_t WHERE ( sender = #{messageDto.receiver} OR sender = #{messageDto.sender} ) AND ( receiver = #{messageDto.receiver} OR receiver = #{messageDto.sender} ) AND ( hide_message NOT IN ( #{messageDto.sender} ) OR hide_message IS NULL ) AND action IN (0,1,3) ) A LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t B ON A.sender = B.user_name LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t C ON A.receiver = C.user_name
AND A.format in (1,5)
AND A.format = 3
AND A.content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageDto.content},'%')
GROUP BY A.id ORDER BY A.`timestamp` DESC

SELECT from_unixtime( A.`timestamp` / 1000, '%Y-%m-%d' ) historyTime, A.id as m_id, A.receiver as m_receiver, A.sender as m_sender , B.real_name as m_senderRealName, A.`timestamp` as m_timestamp, A.content as m_content FROM iap_im_message_t A LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t B ON A.sender = B.user_name WHERE (A.sender = #{messageDto.sender} OR A.sender = #{messageDto.receiver}) AND (A.receiver = #{messageDto.sender} OR A.receiver = #{messageDto.receiver}) AND A.format IN
#{item}

SELECT A.id AS A_id, A.list_type AS listType, A.sender AS A_receiver, A.show_type AS showType, A.receiver AS A_sender, B.avatar AS A_receiverAvatar, B.real_name AS realName, C.* FROM iap_im_message_user_t A LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t B ON A.sender = B.user_name LEFT JOIN ( SELECT A.sender as m_sender, A.receiver as m_receiver, A.content as m_content, A.action as m_action, A.state as m_state, A.`timestamp` as m_timestamp, A.id AS m_id, B.real_name as m_receiverRealName, B.avatar as m_receiverAvatar, C.real_name as m_senderRealName, C.avatar as m_sendAvatar, A.hide_message as m_hide_message FROM iap_im_message_t A LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t B ON A.receiver = B.user_name LEFT JOIN iap_sys_user_t C ON A.sender = C.user_name WHERE ( A.sender = #{sender} AND A.receiver = #{receiver} ) OR ( A.receiver = #{sender} AND A.sender = #{receiver} ) ORDER BY A.`timestamp` DESC LIMIT 0,20 ) C ON ( A.sender = C.m_sender OR A.sender = C.m_receiver ) AND ( A.receiver = C.m_sender OR A.receiver = C.m_receiver ) WHERE C.m_hide_message != #{sender} AND ( A.sender = #{sender} AND A.receiver = #{receiver} ) OR ( A.receiver = #{sender} AND A.sender = #{receiver} ) GROUP BY C.m_id
